name: Outcast - Second Contact

files.zip: N/A:Select zip file downloaded from Humble Bundle "Outcast-7693-DRMFREE.zip"

content:
files:
- zip: N/A:Select zip file downloaded from Humble Bundle "Outcast-7693-DRMFREE.zip"
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Outcast - Second Contact/outcast.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2012 win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    description: Extracting zip folder
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Outcast - Second Contact
    src: zip
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
